message:
Hi, :)
3 problems 3:) .. #chrome_dev #Ionic #Angularjs

The #1 problem: I need to open dev tools in new window while "Emulation"
I tried googling q=open+inspect+element+in+new+window+chrome
but in chrome 43.0.2357.81 I can't find the little box which can separate it to a new window ... 
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/30690877

#2 things go behind header in Ionic project ..
I tried googling q=ionic+header+over+content 
but Couldn't find a working answer

#3 should I master JS to use Angularjs ?? I know the basics but want to work on an API using Angularjs $http get .. and find that quiet hard ...

data.message: I hv done a small trick in the #2 prob .. I hv placed a <h2> tag ... so my items can temporarily appear correctly !
1. It should be the icon next to the `x`. It has a small arrow / triangle on the bottom right. Click and pull that to get the new-window button
2. I don't know Inoic (on my list as it's booming), but in similar frameworks, you usually have to have some margin or padding to push the content after the fixed position header

3. It's a JavaScript framework. The API doesn't build on a lot of JS concepts at user front, so, it's not an absolute requirement, but JS is full of gotchas, and you could fall into these with any JS framework even Angular. Knowing these helps avoid wasting time pulling your hair because of something that you just didn't know works in an illogical way.

Mohamed Meligy thx for ur answers ^^
but 1. I need to seperate the dev tools completely in a new win ... the button u mentioned just changes the position of it  if horizontal or vertical in the same window

2. It's my first time using an UI framework I used to develop my apps completely from zero ... I tried overwriting the framework css by a style.css file and messing with some paddings or margins .. nothing happened !? so should I change the main css ?!!

3. JS is really weird :) ! u can't figure out where the problem easily .. so ur advice to knowing more JS concepts ? and trying again with AngularJS .. ^_^ !
u "long click"  the icon ..  another icon appears click it .. u got a separate window dev tools :D <3
It does get new window if you notice the triangle I told you about and press it instead of the button itself. You'll see another button of two intersecting squares
For 2, show me a fiddle of your html
I'm on mobile and can't play with it until an hour or so. Have you tried giving top padding to the container?
and also worked after padding for the whole container <3

Oh frameworks :) ! for lazy professional coders ^^.. it's like dragging and dropping !! Saves time incredibly
This application supposed to : 
1. Shows cv the good way
2. Remotly update it with my new skills ...
3. Push notification when I achieve something remarkable 

Alpha release .. Still working on it .. the android api 22 took me a lot of time while downloading .. it's necessary to compile the ionic app ..
